document_data.name: Dral Thelev
document_data.mainbody: '''Dral Thelev''' was an one-eyed [[half-orc]] innkeeper in [[Everlund]] sometime after the [[War of the Silver Marches]].
document_data.Activities: Dral managed the [[Danivarr's House]] inn under the [[Zoar]] family. Both the [[Harpers]] and the [[Zhentarim]] spied upon the place.
